projects.name: HRIS System
projects.description: An Human Resource Information System used by human resource and employees, It is where the Admin which is the HR can add/edit/delete users info, Post Announcement which can be viewed by the employee in the dashboard page when they login, The HR can also view/approved/reject employee filed leaves, Admin can print user documents, check user late and absents. Employee has a page where in they can file leaves, view announcements, view payslips generated by the Admin
